name: CDN Geographic Coverage
tagline: A summary of regional PoP coverage for popular CDNs.
body:
## Last updated on 2015/08/27
This page is an effort to maintain an up-to-date list of what CDNs have PoP locations around the world. Most of the data is compiled directly from the CDN's own public network page, but there is also some data from academic research. We only count distinct PoP metro-level locations (e.g. if a CDN has 2 PoPs in Los Angeles, we only count this as one). Each network name contains a link to the original data source.

See information about our ongoing CDN work at [http://mappinggoogle.cs.usc.edu](http://mappinggoogle.cs.usc.edu)

### Note: Only the numbers in the "Total" column are currently up to date. We are currently in the process of updating the region-specific data.

Please send any corrections, updates, etc... to calderm 'at' usc.edu.  

| Network           | North America | EU  | Asia | China | Oceania | South America | Total |
|-------------------|---------------|-----|------|-------|---------|---------------|-------|
| [Akamai](http://conferences.sigcomm.org/sigcomm/2015/pdf/papers/p167.pdf) | n/a | n/a | n/a  | n/a | n/a | n/a           | "over 1000" |
| [Level3](http://maps.level3.com/) | 27  | 21   | 4     | 4       | 1             | 5     | 62   |
| [MaxCDN](https://www.maxcdn.com/features/network/) | 22  | 31  | 3    | 0   | 1   | 1  | 58    |
| [Leaseweb](https://www.leaseweb.com/platform/network) | 10 | 20  | 2    | 0  | 0    | 0  | 32    |
| [CDN77](https://www.cdn77.com/network)| 7  | 12  | 5    | 0     | 1       | 3   | 28    |
| [Incapsula](https://www.incapsula.com/incapsula-global-network-map.html)| 9 | 4   | 3    | 0   | 2    | 0    | 25    |
| [Highwinds](http://www.highwinds.com/en/network)| 13   | 7   | 3    | 0     | 1       | 2    | 24    |
| [ChinaCache](http://www.chinacache.com/global-solutions/us-and-europe) | 8 | 3   | 12   | 127   | 0      | 0    | 23    |
| [Fastly](https://status.fastly.com/) | 8  | 3   | 3    | 0     | 3       | 0  | 23    |
| [KeyCDN](https://www.keycdn.com/network)| 5   | 4   | 4    | 0     | 1  | 1    | 22    |
| [Bitgravity](http://www.bitgravity.com/images/lightbox/network_map.gif) | 6  | 3   | 8  | 0  | 2     | 0    | 19    |
| [CDNify](https://cdnify.com/network) | 9 | 6   | 3    | 0     | 0       | 0    | 17    |
| [CDNetworks](http://www.cdnetworks.com/company/global-network/)  | 12   | 31  | 18   | 21    | 1  | 6    | 161   |
| [SkyparkCDN](http://www.skyparkcdn.com/#network) | 8  | 14  | 12   | 0     | 1       | 1    | 119   |
| [ChinaNetCenter](http://en.chinanetcenter.com/pages/technology/g2-network-map.php) | 9  | 7   | 8  | 400  | 1 | 1 | ~428  |
| [Google](http://mappinggoogle.cs.usc.edu)  |      |     |      |       |         |       | 1723  |
| [Cachefly](http://cachefly.cachefly.net/networkmap/) | 11    | 12  | 6    | 0     | 2       | 1    | 41    |
| [Amazon Cloudfront](https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/details/) | 14  | 10  | 9    | 0     | 2       | 2   | 37    |
| [EdgeCast](http://www.edgecast.com/network/map/) | 9  | 9   | 6    | 0     | 2  | 1   | 31    |
| [CloudFlare](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-map) | | | | | | | 43 |
| [Internap](http://www2.internap.com/l/16412/2013-03-18/4zsz1/16412/41988/CDN_Datasheet.pdf) | n/a   | n/a | n/a  | n/a   | n/a     | n/a           | 19    |
| Limelight         | n/a   | n/a | n/a  | n/a   | n/a     | n/a           |  n/a     |
| NGENIX            | n/a   | n/a   | n/a    | n/a     | n/a       | n/a             |  n/a     |
| XCDN              | n/a   | n/a | n/a  | n/a   | n/a     | n/a           |  n/a     |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
